name: O-Bot The Robot
description:
Destroy Evil Robots! Collect Gears! Don't get destroyed!

O-Bot was chilling in the forest until evil robots attacked his place! So our hero decided to stop this chaos and save everyone! But he doesn't know who caused all this!


Controls:
Arrow keys - Move
Z - Jump / Select 

Credits
